details: The Essential Addons for Elementor â€“ Popular Elementor Templates and Widgets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the via `Calendar` And `Business Reviews` Widgets attributes in all versions up to, and including, 6.1.19 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
